languages.text: Непостижимым образом мир-улей из системы Гронос оказался разрушен. Главный город на его поверхности, добывающий прометий для протектората фон Валанциус, остается безмолвен.

traits.locale_text: Атласов Предел настиг тот же катаклизм, что и Райкада Минорис — из системы бесследно исчезла звезда Нол-Ла IV. Единственный свидетель произошедшего — мир-улей Гордость Сантиэля, принадлежащий торговой империи фон Валанциус, — остается безмолвен.

languages.text: A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.
languages.original_text: Непостижимым образом мир-улей из системы Гронос оказался разрушен. Главный город на его поверхности, добывающий прометий для протектората фон Валанциус, остается безмолвен.

traits.locale_text: Nolla Septum fell victim to the same cataclysm as Rykad Minoris — the star Nolla-IV vanished from the system without a trace. The only witness to the event — the hive world of Santiel's Pride, part of the von Valancius trade empire — remains silent.

Nolla Septum fell victim to the same cataclysm as Rykad Minoris — the star Nolla-IV vanished from the system without a trace. The only witness to the event — the hive world of Santiel's Pride, part of the von Valancius trade empire — remains silent.

Nolla Septum fell victim to the same cataclysm as Rykad Minoris — the star Nolla-IV vanished from the system without a trace. The only witness to the event — the hive world of Santiel's Pride, part of the von Valancius trade empire — remains silent.
A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius trade empire, remains silent.
A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.
A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.

languages.text: 格罗诺斯星系中的某个巢都世界被不明原因摧毁。而那颗行星上的主要城市，也就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的钷素来源之一，依然没有传来任何信息。
languages.original_text: A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.

traits.locale_text: 格罗诺斯星系中的某个巢都世界被不明原因摧毁。而那颗行星上的主要城市，也就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的钷素来源之一，依然没有传来任何信息。

languages.text: グロノス星系の過密惑星が不可解なことに破壊された。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領のプロメチウム供給源である惑星の主要都市は黙したままだ。
languages.original_text: A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.

traits.locale_text: グロノス星系の過密惑星が不可解なことに破壊された。フォン・ヴァランシウス保護領のプロメチウム供給源である惑星の主要都市は黙したままだ。

languages.text: Un mundo colmena del sistema Gronos ha sido destruido sin explicación aparente. La ciudad principal del planeta, una fuente de prometio para el protectorado von Valancius, guarda silencio.
languages.original_text: A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.

traits.locale_text: Un mundo colmena del sistema Gronos ha sido destruido sin explicación aparente. La ciudad principal del planeta, una fuente de prometio para el protectorado von Valancius, guarda silencio.

languages.text: Eine Makropolwelt im Gronos-System wurde unerklärlicherweise zerstört. Der Kontakt zur Hauptstadt des Planeten, einer Promethiumquelle des Valancius-Protektorats, ist abgebrochen.
languages.original_text: A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.

traits.locale_text: Eine Makropolwelt im Gronos-System wurde unerklärlicherweise zerstört. Der Kontakt zur Hauptstadt des Planeten, einer Promethiumquelle des Valancius-Protektorats, ist abgebrochen.

languages.text: Un monde ruche du système de Gronos a été détruit dans les circonstances mystérieuses. La principale ville de la planète, qui fournit le protectorat von Valancius en prométhium, ne donne plus de nouvelles.
languages.original_text: A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.

traits.locale_text: Un monde ruche du système de Gronos a été détruit dans les circonstances mystérieuses. La principale ville de la planète, qui fournit le protectorat von Valancius en prométhium, ne donne plus de nouvelles.

languages.text: Gronos Sistemi'ndeki bir kovan dünya, açıklanamaz bir şekilde yok oldu. Gezegenin von Valancius protektorası için prometyum kaynağı olan ana şehri, sessizliğe gömüldü.
languages.original_text: A hive world in the Gronos System has been inexplicably destroyed. The main city on the planet, a source of promethium for the von Valancius protectorate, remains silent.

traits.locale_text: Gronos Sistemi'ndeki bir kovan dünya açıklanamaz bir şekilde yok oldu. Gezegenin, von Valancius protektorası için bir prometyum kaynağı olan ana şehri sessizliğe gömüldü.
